item.title: 周四，该公司股票在纽约证券交易所开始交易，股票代码为 RDDT，开盘价为 47 美元，远高于每股 34 美元的首次公开募股价格：
item.description:
The stock opened at $47 as trading began on Thursday at the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker RDDT, far above its IPO price of $34 a share: https://t.co/2Mzh0cUvVO pic.twitter.com/bFab1UQKAb

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024

item.title: 很高兴能与 @Mikepeeljourno 一起为这篇引人入胜（也令人担忧）的文章制作图表。联合国预测显示，全球人口将在 2080 年代达到 104 亿的峰值（现在是 80 亿）。但这掩盖了许多国家的生育率已经低于 2.1 更替水平的事实。
item.description:
Great to work on the graphics for this fascinating (and worrying) piece with @Mikepeeljourno. UN forecasts suggest the global population will peak at 10.4bn in the 2080s (it's 8bn now). BUT this masks how fertility rates in many countries are already below 2.1 replacement level https://t.co/UJ5sZORNsc

— Janina Conboye (@JaninaConboye) March 21, 2024

item.title: 共同基金管理着近 200 亿美元的美国资产和约 630 亿美元的全球资产。但如今，共同基金的主导地位正受到新对手的威胁，这些新对手承诺提供税收优惠、低费用和快速交易
item.description:
Mutual funds manage nearly $20tn in US assets and about $63tn worldwide. But today, the mutual fund’s dominance is under threat from newer rivals that promise tax advantages, lower fees and rapid trading https://t.co/maIlebTVVE pic.twitter.com/V3BQzZSla6

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024
